name: Yakuza: Restoration
description:
"Ryu ga Gotoku: Ishin!" is a spin-off of "Ryu ga Gotoku" series recording 6 million in sales worldwide.
Walking in the footsteps of Ryoma Sakamoto, the game takes us on a journey back to the turbulent era of the Bakumatsu period. With improved visuals, engaging storyline starring actual historical figures, innovative battle system and replay value, SEGA proudly presents "Ryu ga Gotoku: Ishin!" as an addition to the "Ryu ga Gotoku" franchise.
